SD.title: Software Development (MBO4)
SD.text: I started studying software development at MA in 2022, initially focusing on game development. Later, I shifted to web development, where I’ve been building modern, user-friendly applications.

CSC.title: Cyber Security Course
CSC.text: I completed a one-day cybersecurity course at IBM, where I learned the fundamentals of how data is transferred over the internet, such as the process behind sending an email.

FI.title: Flyball Instructor
FI.text: As volunteers, my sister and I currently train three flyball groups at the local cynology club where we grew up. We've guided multiple teams to an advanced level through structured, hands-on coaching.

SS.title: Service Staff – Bar & Host Services
SS.text: I am currently working as a Food and Beverage Server at Courtyard by Marriott. My primary responsibilities include bartending and taking orders in the brasserie. Additionally, I have helped train multiple new employees, contributing to team development and smooth operations.

ISD.title: Intern Software Development
ISD.text: As part of my studies, I am required to complete two internships at software companies. For my first internship, I chose SMG, where I gained valuable experience in website accessibility and adhering to company standards. I also gained insight into the business environment.
